items.name: Brasil Halter Top
items.about: Reworked Brasil jersey halter top. Hand-cut and reconstructed with raw edge detailing and adjustable buckle straps. Each piece is one-of-a-kind.

items.name: Splatter Logo Tee
items.about: Heavyweight cotton tee with hand-applied bleach splatter effect and OBSCN calligraphy print. Back features the signature cherry bomb logo. No two are alike.

items.name: Patchwork Wide Jeans
items.about: Distressed wide-leg jeans with hand-sewn plaid patchwork inserts. Whiskered wash with raw hem finish. Sits low on the waist.

items.name: Distressed Bermuda
items.about: Overdyed bermuda shorts with heavy distressing and contrast stitch repair. Pink acid wash with black patchwork panels. Relaxed fit.

items.name: OBSCN Lookbook Set
items.about: The full OBSCN experience. Curated set from our debut collection featuring your choice of top and bottom pairing.
